ViewObject.Name: PrtCardsPerRVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
select partner_id,null as account_id,null as CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE,null as CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE,null as CARDGROUP_SEQ, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action = '0' and card_expiry > = sysdate and partner_id = :id) as active, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action = '1' and card_expiry > = sysdate and partner_id = :id) as tempBlock, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action in (0,1,2) and card_expiry >= :currentDate and card_expiry <= :nextMonth and partner_id = :id) as expired from prt_card where partner_id = :id and :paramValue = 'partner' group by partner_id
union
select null as partner_id,account_id,null as CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE,null as CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE,null as CARDGROUP_SEQ, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action = '0' and card_expiry > = sysdate and account_id = :id) as active, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action = '1' and card_expiry > = sysdate and account_id = :id) as tempBlock, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action in (0,1,2) and card_expiry >= :currentDate and card_expiry <= :nextMonth and account_id = :id) as expired from prt_card where account_id = :id and :paramValue = 'account' group by account_id
union
select null as partner_id,null as account_id,CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE,CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE,CARDGROUP_SEQ, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action = '0' and card_expiry > = sysdate and CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SEQ = :id) as active, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action = '1' and card_expiry > = sysdate and CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SEQ = :id) as tempBlock, (select count(block_action) from prt_card where country_code = :countryCode and block_action in (0,1,2) and card_expiry >= :currentDate and card_expiry <= :nextMonth and CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SEQ = :id) as expired from prt_card where CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE||CARDGROUP_SEQ = :id and :paramValue = 'cardgroup' group by CARDGROUP_MAIN_TYPE,CARDGROUP_SUB_TYPE,CARDGROUP_SEQ
